oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Virna - a database on organic food production
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Koistinen, Riitta
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Research methodology and philosophy
"Organics" in general
Food systems
Soil
Farming Systems
Crop husbandry
Animal husbandry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Virna is an article reference database on organic food production. It contains material about such matters as organic and ecological crop production and horticulture, soil, fertilization, plant protection, animal production, processing of organic products, marketing and the environmental impacts of agriculture. The literature references have been taken from periodicals and congress publications as well as compilations.
